subject: Baseball
Auctions
All Star Games
World Series
Memorabilia and Souvenirs
lead_paragraph: An auction during All-Star festivities will sell the bat and baseball from the Chris Chambliss home run that lifted the Yankees into the World Series in 1976.
snippet: An auction during All-Star festivities will sell the bat and baseball from the Chris Chambliss home run that lifted the Yankees into the World Series in 1976.
